mapper.update:

id = #{id},
uid = #{uid},
idMaCompany = #{idMaCompany},
idOpRoomOperation = #{idOpRoomOperation},
idOpRoomElectric = #{idOpRoomElectric},
idOpDevice = #{idOpDevice},
countMain = #{countMain},
countSub = #{countSub},

tag = #{tag},

modifiedDate = #{modifiedDate},
modifiedIp = #{modifiedIp},
